review_title: APPOINTMENT OF A CHILD NEUROLOGIST. DOES NOT CAUSE SIDE EFFECTS. WORKING SUPPLEMENT FOR CHILDREN WHO ARE SLEEPING BAD OR IRRITATED
review_text: My son is 5 years old, goes to the garden + is engaged in karate. At one point, suddenly it became bad, began to complain of heart, wanted to lie down. They called an ambulance, took an EKG, measured the pressure, and was admitted to the hospital. After the blood pressure was brought down and the tests came, I was referred to a pediatric neurologist. He said that the growing body cannot cope with the load, plus some slightest stress provoked such a reaction. The doctor prescribed a sedative from Boiron. The composition contains extracts of chamomile, gelsemia, passionflower, stramonium and potassium bromide. All these substances are designed to relieve the child of insomnia, irritability and nervousness. Course - 24 days you need to drink 1 dose at night. In 15 doses, each in a plastic ampoule. After about a week, I really noticed that my son began to fall asleep faster; it became easier for him to study in the garden; fatigue is gone. If earlier by Thursday he was already barely trudging to this training, now even on Friday he is vigorous, and has enough strength for everything. I recommend for purchase to those who have similar problems with the child. If the review was helpful to you, click Like. Thanks! Health to you and your children!
